events.message: The insured filed a claim reporting a rear-end car collision that occurred on 2024-03-30 during rush hour traffic on Main Street.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and confirming keywords related to vehicle collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to this auto accident case to ensure thorough investigation and prompt service delivery.
The claim acknowledgement notification was sent to the policyholder, confirming receipt and outlining next steps in the claims process.
Request sent for the accident police report, photos of vehicle damage, and the policyholder’s insurance card to support the investigation.
The policyholder submitted all requested documents including the police report, photos, and repair estimates for review.
The agent initiated the investigation by reviewing all submitted documents and contacting witnesses to verify collision details.
The investigation was completed confirming liability of the at-fault driver and assessing the extent of vehicle damages.
A settlement offer was proposed to the claimant based on repair costs and policy coverage limits, with clear terms included.
The policyholder expressed satisfaction with the prompt service and clarity of the settlement offer during feedback call.
The claim was formally approved after acceptance of the settlement terms and verification of all required documentation.
Payment covering vehicle repair costs was disbursed electronically to the policyholder’s preferred bank account.
The auto accident claim was officially closed following successful payment and confirmation of repair completion by the insured.
All records related to the claim were archived securely for future reference and compliance with regulatory requirements.
